title: Undi18 Website
description: Designed and developed the website for Undi18, a youth-led organisation with the mission of building a movement of champions for democracy.
body:
> * Volunteered to redesign their website to be more informative and accessible to the wider public with pages for About Us, Programmes, Campaigns, and a careers page
> * Built the website using GatsbyJS and Tailwind
> * See the live website [here](https://undi18.org/)
